import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {Invoice} from "../dto/invoice"; @Component({ selector: 'app-invoice', templateUrl: './invoice.component.html', styleUrls: ['./invoice.component.scss'] }) export class InvoiceComponent { invoiceList:Array=[]; constructor(private http:HttpClient) { http.get>('api/v1/invoices/').subscribe(elm=>{ this.invoiceList=elm; }) } }
